description:
A zip-in power skirt to create a full seal between your ski/snowboard jacket and pants.

The ski/snowboard zip-seal addition can be zipped between your Norrøna ski/snowboard jackets and pants to create a full seal stopping snow and wind from entering.

They use a durable flex1 stretch fabric for this bib because it offers flexibility in size, durability, breathability, snow and wind protection.

The fabric is a recycled 85% nylon and 15% Elastane (BLUESIGN approved) 163 g/m2, to make this bib durable and flexible enough to not stand in the way of your mobility.

This zip-seal has a relaxed fit, like their powder skirts.
name: Norrona Ski/Snowboard Zip-Seal - Mens
